channel.title: [Delta] Where are the sidebars set?

item.title: [Delta] Where are the sidebars set?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

You’re asking how to change whats in the interface? Then you would need an interface editor… It’s not server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Where are the sidebars set?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2, topic:463252”]Sidebar id # 1 is the skill interface.

So change “3917” to the interface you want.[/quote]

I understand that, but I want to change what is displayed within “3917”. So it’s going to set it to the sidebar interface 3917, where is the 3917 defined. Edit: This is the setSidebarInterface() method.

public void setSidebarInterface(int menuId, int form) { outStream.createFrame(71); outStream.writeWord(form); outStream.writeByteA(menuId); }

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Where are the sidebars set?

item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Sidebar id # 1 is the skill interface.

So change “3917” to the interface you want.

item.title: [Delta] Where are the sidebars set?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I’ve found this to set the sidebars on logging in.

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917); setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);

However, I want to change the sidebar, for the skills tab. Where may I be able to do so on Delta??

Read full topic
